description: Information about the SMS or Email device related to an event.

delivery_address.description:
* If 'device_type' is 'SMS', this field shows the MSISDN.
* If `device_type` is `EMAIL`, this field shows the email address.

device_type.description: The platform that the channel is on.

named_user_id.description: The named user the channel is associated with.

title: Device Information for SMS and Email
